content: 1/19/09 --i have recently adjusted the hook size in the pattern due to getting some feedback that people s bags were turning out smaller than mine i am a very loose crocheter and didn t allow for that with the original pattern i am sorry to anyone who has run in to this problem if you are a tight crocheter go with the larger hook size --cassiemarie materials around 150 yards of worsted weight yarn preferably cotton size h or j crochet hook go with the j if you crochet tightly
